name: @free-ui/button
description: A Button executes an action when clicked. Button labels should use only one or two words, and begin with an active verb. There are three Button variants: Primary is the most commontly-used button; Secondary performs an action less likely to be triggered; Call-To-Action (CTA) performs a critical action on the screen.
author: Potato <toicodedoec@gmail.com>
